description.displayText: Amanda is my best friend for 11 years now and is my son's amazing God mother. She is incredible with kids, and is so much fun. She is very responsible that when I was hospitalized with an infection a week after I had my son I had her watch him for me. She takes her jobs very seriously and loves what she does. I wouldn't have made her my son's God mother if I didn't feel that she would be a great role model for him.
